metadata.title: CVE-2019-13287 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In Xpdf 4.01.01, there is an out-of-bounds read vulnerability in thefunction SplashXPath::strokeAdjust() located at splash/SplashXPath.cc. Itcan, for example, be triggered by sending a crafted PDF document to thepdftoppm tool. It might allow an attacker to cause Information Disclosure.This is related to CVE-2018-16368.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-13287` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu4
libpoppler-cpp0v5 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu4
libpoppler-glib8 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu4
libpoppler-qt5-1 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu4
libpoppler111 - 0.76.1-0ubuntu4
poppler-utils - 0.76.1-0ubuntu4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: poppler package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.76.1-0ubuntu4').
